title:
Calculation of the correlation, relativistic and QED corrections to the
  total electron binding energy in atoms and their nuclear charge dependence
authors: V. A. Dzuba, V. V. Flambaum, A. V. Afanasjev
abstract:
We present relativistic many-body calculations of total electron binding
energy of neutral atoms up to element $Z=120$. Binding energy for ions may be
found by subtracting known ionization potentials. Accuracy of the results for
$17<Z \le105$ significantly exceeds that in NIST tables (there are no data for
$Z>105$ there). We fit numerical results for binding energies by analytical
function of $Z$. We also calculate numerical values and determine dependence on
$Z$ of the correlation corrections, Dirac and Breit relativistic corrections
and quantum electrodynamics (QED) corrections.
